Articles.Content:
I posted this over in the KSP facebook thread and some people enjoyed it so thought I would post it over here ( I edited a few bits )

EDIT NOTE, edited to incorporate Tw1s excellent suggestions.

It started when somebody started a Bohemian rhapsody comment and I got carried away.

You just need to picture Bill , Bob and Jeb bouncing their heads around Waynes World style at the appropriate time.

To the tune of, oh do I really have to say so?

Is this the real life?

Is this just K.S.P?

Caught in an S.O.I (no escape from gravity)

Open your eyes, look up to the skies and see

I'm just a green Jeb , (poor Bob) I need no sympathy

Because it's an easy launch, with fuel flow, apsis high, no asparagus woe

Any way the staging goes, doesn't really matter to me, to me

Werner, I just killed a Kerbal

Put some boosters under Jeb, then pushed the stage and now he's dead

Werner, career mode had just begun... But now I've gone and thrown it all away

Werner, oooooooh

Didn't mean to make you fry, if I'm not back again this time tomorrow,

Transmit on, transmit on, as if the science really matters

Too late, my maneuver node gone, sent shivers down my spine, not using alarm clock all the time

Goodbye everybody, I've got to go. Gotta leave Jool behind and face the truth.

Werner, ooooooh. (Way the staging goes)

I don't wanna Jeb to die, I sometimes wish I'd never downloaded at all.

I see a little silhouetto of a Mun,

Jebediah , Jebadiah will you do the booster go go?

SRBs and strutting, very very frightening , me

BoosterMoar, (DeltaV), BoosterMoar, (VAB), BoosterMoar, KSC

S.S.T.O-o-o-o-o-o

I'm just a poor Bob, nobody loves me

He's just a poor Bob from a poor Kerbaily

Spare him his life from this Whackjobity

Throttle high, fuel low, Eve let me go?

Apoapsis, no! Eve will not let you go.

Let him go!

Periapsis, no! Eve will not let you go.

Let me go!

Eve not let you go.

Never never never let you go-o-o-o-o

No no no no no no no!

Oh MechaJeba, Mechajeba

MechaJeba help me go

The Forum now has a Challenge online for me, for me, for me

So you think you can mod it and make aerodynamics fly?

So you run out of DV and then hyperedit the orbit so high?

Oh, point 2 3. Can't do this to me point 2 3? Just gotta get out, just gotta get an update out of here.

Oooooh. Oh yeah Oh yeah

Staging really matters.

Any Kerb can see.

Staging really matters...... staging really matters....

To me.

(Anyway the updates go)

Edited January 22, 2014 by Precambrianmollusc
Suggestions
Bwahahahahaah

Is it sad that sang that entire thing in my head as I read it?

Awesome work, I love it!
As an avid Queen fan, this made me laugh more than it should have. I sang (sung?) the entire thing out loud and loved it! Have some Rep.

Is it sad that sang that entire thing in my head as I read it?

Awesome work, I love it!

Not at all sad - I did too!

*hands over a microphone*

Hey. If you're going to sing - sing into this.

Same here! And paused for bits like the guitar solo.

I actually think it could be improved, a few bits of grammar and rhythm aren't as perfect, but you've pretty much covered everything. Welcome to the Kerbal forum, Precambrianmollusc!

This would make a cool video.

Hey. If you're going to sing - sing into this.

I laughed far more than I should have.

Bob, what are you doing here? You're booster'd out again!

Not at all sad - I did too!

*hands over a microphone*

Hey. If you're going to sing - sing into this.

*Motions to share microphone*

I don't want to take all of the spotlight, if you are singing too we should share and make it epic!

Thanks everyone.

Any suggestions please take it and run with it or let me know and I think I can edit and obviously will credit. Cheers!

Going into editing mode... (Which may seem a little blunt.)

Suggestions:

Caught in a S.O.I

Either change 'a' to 'an' or write sphere of influence out in full.

Because I'm easy orbit,

Doesn't make sense. Could this bit be changed to be about a launch? It would fit better with the rest of the line as well. Perhaps "Because it's easy launch, with fuel flow,.."

Put some boosters under Jeb, pushed the stage now he's dead

Personally, I think it could be better as "Then pushed stage, now he's dead" but the original is ok too.

The Forum has a Challenge for me, for me, for me

There doesn't seem to be enough syllables in this line. Perhaps adding the word "online" after "Challenge" could bring it up

So you can run out of DV then hyperedit the orbit so high?

"And then" may flow a little better, and maybe remove 'can'. But I'm nitpicking a little here.
duplicate, mods please remove.

Thanks Tw1.

I made the suggested changes, the "Beelzebub has a devil put aside for me" line was certainly missing a good few syllables.

The line with point 23 ( supposed to replace "baby" from the original) needs something and

"If I'm not back again this time tomorrow" could do with some kerbalising, maybe an aerobraking or lithobraking reference?

It would be nice to get the phrase "unexpected energetic disassembly" in there somehow.

Cheers.

It would be nice to get the phrase "unexpected energetic disassembly" in there somehow.

Cheers.

Sudden unplanned disassembly seems more commonly used in these forums. The one other thing missing is the kracken, but there's only so much you can fit in one song.

Same here! And paused for bits like the guitar solo.

I actually think it could be improved, a few bits of grammar and rhythm aren't as perfect, but you've pretty much covered everything. Welcome to the Kerbal forum, Precambrianmollusc!

This would make a cool video.

If someone can sing/mix the audio, I can make the video.

Freddie Moho strikes again!

Now do "Kerbal Queen" and "

". Maybe tack "
" on the B-side.

Hey!

I like Bob, he's probably my favourite. It's nice to try and find something he wont be scared of. In my save he lives on the KSS in the zoology lab with all the space kittens.

Love te song, sang as I read!

If someone can sing/mix the audio, I can make the video.

This guy, majorfubar69, has the instrumental only at this youtube link, apparently sound downloadable via firefox according to the comments.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M9-U2gV-Fek

If you can get the sound from that and then do the lyrics Kerbaloke style (sorry) along the bottom?

Not sure what the copyright would be , if they haven't issued a takedown for the youtube linked it may be OK, and I think you can get away with a lot based on fair use/ parody, then again I am no copyright lawyer.

Oh the Muppets parody on the related videos link at the youtube is well worth a look.

Edited January 30, 2014 by Precambrianmollusc
muppet link
Funny, when I started reading the lyrics, this song came to my mind.

This guy, majorfubar69, has the instrumental only at this youtube link, apparently sound downloadable via firefox according to the comments.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M9-U2gV-Fek

If you can get the sound from that and then do the lyrics Kerbaloke style (sorry) along the bottom?

Not sure what the copyright would be , if they haven't issued a takedown for the youtube linked it may be OK, and I think you can get away with a lot based on fair use/ parody, then again I am no copyright lawyer.

Oh the Muppets parody on the related videos link at the youtube is well worth a look.

Good find! Alas, I cannot sing at all. XD

Most parodies are hard to prosecute on anyways, and as long as I don't try to make money on the final product, most companies won't care.

I was thinking just the sound and have the lyrics scrolling along the bottom with no singing, so people can do their own. I suspect getting anyone who can sing is going to be tough.

If I get some time I will work through and put timing marks on the lyrics based on that youtube video, that would also help with video scene transition timing markers.

My wife is going to think I am nuts listening to the real and music only versions over and over again.

Then again, she already thinks I am kinda nuts for launching little green aliens into space.

Edited January 31, 2014 by Precambrianmollusc
Made me launch out loud. Apologies for the bump :/ (more people might want to see this)
This made me chuckle. It's really funny.
